title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3963/89 of 20 December 1989 fixing the storage premium for certain fishery products for the 1990 fishing year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3963/89
of 20 December 1989
fixing the storage premium for certain fishery products for the 1990 fishing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1990 fishing year, the storage premium for Norway lobsters (Nephrops norvegicus) and edible crabs (Cancer pagurus) shall be as set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1989.
For the Commission
Manuel MARĂN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 282, 2. 10. 1989, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 39, 14. 2. 1986, p. 8.
(4) OJ No L 209, 21. 7. 1989, p. 30.
ANNEX
Amount of premium
